divs: Sighting Detailsi was at our home in 1966 and age 6. i went outside onto the back patio because it was warm. i had gotten up to see my dad go to work i guess. i was just up. when i turned to come back in i saw to my right a small orange glowing diamond shaped "thing" app. 8-10" in hight. totally silent. it was bouncing on it's bottom point but not touching the ground as it was moving along the edge of the foundation. i would guess it was moving at about 16" skips, or spaces going to the left. i watched it go from the dirt of the flower bed across the concrete patio and into the other flower bed. app. 8' in all. then ran screaming into the house. i have wonderd what the hell that thing was for the last 41 yrs. any clues guys? sure was weird. thank you, newman riley
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bellbrook
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: small diamond shaped orange 8-10" obeject bounching on ground at base of home foundation, silent.
